trends: There has been one other sighting in Paw Paw
There were no other sightings in Paw Paw on or around November 2nd 2013
Summary: First noticed it hovering in place, then there was a flash and it flew away..
divs: Sighting DetailsWalking home, then something caught my eye. What made me notice the object was the sudden urge to look up. At first I thought it was a star or something but, then after a few seconds realized it wasn't. The object was just hovering in the sky, then there was a flash of light and it disappeared. After it went away I waited a few seconds then ran away.
